name: Crab Bungalow
description:
Crab Bungalow is a relaxing, short puzzle game where you command crabs to help you escape the island.

-- PLAYING IN FULL SCREEN IS VERY RECOMMENDED --

Movement: WASD

Camera: Hold Middle Mouse + Move Mouse

Recall Crabs: Press R and highlight crabs - Requires the Conch Shell

Launch Crabs: Press Spacebar to ragdoll crabs.  Send them towards a target and launch.

----------------------------------------------

Main Programming, Art: Zope, Xuubasa, SandAll

Music, Audio Programming: tfx
